metadata.title: Mama Fresco's 10" x 11" Reusable Pizza Saver Food Storage Bags, BPA Free, Pack of 12, 10 x 11-Inches
features: Mama Fresco’s Pizza Storage Bags easily stores leftover pizza to save space in the fridge and reduce food spoilage
Made from BPA-free, food-grade plastic; measures 10-inches wide by 11-inches tall; includes 12 bags; not for microwave or oven use
Patented triangular shape accommodates regular, extra-large and deep-dish slices of pizza; hassle-free ziplock top; displays contents clearly
Allow pizza to cool before storing; saves space in the fridge and freezer; transports pizza easily for lunch; makes a great disposable pastry bag, too
Disposable for easy cleanup; easier than aluminum foil or plastic wrap; can be hand washed in warm, soapy water and dry for reuse
description: Mama Fresco’s Pizza Storage Bags seal in freshness and moisture to reduce food spoilage and waste. The patented space-saving design fits in the fridge easier than cramming in the whole pizza box. It’s the best way to store pizza leftovers for another day. The ziplock-style top is easy to open and reclose for hassle-free storage. Each triangular-shaped bag accommodates a single slice of pizza, from regular to extra-large and deep-dish style. Perfect for storing leftover pizza in the fridge and freezer, they take up less precious space than bulky food savers and storage containers, and clearly display the contents for quick identification. Easily take a slice on the go for lunch. Easier for keeping pizza fresh than aluminum foil and plastic wrap. Great as a disposable pastry bag, too. Simply fill with frosting, zip the top of the bag closed, snip off the pointed tip, and squeeze frosting where needed. Made from BPA-free, food-grade plastic. Disposable for easy cleanup. Can be hand washed in warm, soapy water and dry thoroughly for reuse. Includes 12 Pizza Saver Bags. Not intended for microwave or oven use.
